00031 class QMCrgUnit : public CrgUnit, public CustomFields
00032 {
00033 public:
00034     QMCrgUnit() : _occupation_probability(0.), _in_database(false) {}
00035     QMCrgUnit(vector <vec> positions, vector <vec> norms, vector <vec> planes,
00036             const unsigned int & id, CrgUnitType * type,
00037             const unsigned int & molId);
00038 
00039     QMCrgUnit(const unsigned int & id, CrgUnitType * type,
00040             const unsigned int & molId);
00041 
00042     // don't forget to overload these!
00043     //void copyCrgUnit(CrgUnit & acrg);
00044     //void copyCrgUnit(CrgUnit & acrg, const int & id);
00045 
00046     double getOccupationProbability() { return _occupation_probability; }
00047     void  setOccupationProbability(double prob) { _occupation_probability = prob; }
00048 
00049     void setInDatabase(bool indb) { _in_database = indb; }
00050     bool getInDatabase() { return _in_database; }       
00051 
00052     double getTotalEnergy(const char *match="energy_*", const char *nomatch="") {        
00053         //return getDouble("energy_intra")+getDouble("energy_coulomb");
00054         double e=0;
00055         for(map<string, double>::iterator iter = DoubleValues().begin();
00056             iter!= DoubleValues().end(); ++iter) {
00057             if(wildcmp(match, iter->first.c_str()))
00058                 if(!wildcmp(nomatch, iter->first.c_str()))
00059                     e+= iter->second;
00060         }
00061         return e;
00062     }
00063     
00064 protected:
00065     double _occupation_probability;
00066     bool _in_database;
00067 };
00068

00073     
00074 }

00078 {
00079     
00080 }
00081 
00082 }}
